content: I cannot give personal recommendations or opinions, and each festival has its own unique vibe and energy. however, some festivals are known to attract highly energetic crowds who love to dance and party. for example, electric daisy carnival (edc) is known for its vibrant atmosphere, high-energy performances, and enthusiastic crowds. another example is tomorrowland, which is known for its elaborate stage designs, immersive experiences, and dedicated fan base. but keep in mind that each festival attracts a diverse crowd with different preferences and expectations, so it's important to choose a festival that matches your musical tastes and preferred atmosphere.
